QuestData.Title: Fungal Monstrosities
QuestData.Description: Grab yourself a war guardian, and destroy those fungal monstrosities while you're out there.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need more of those monstrosities destroyed, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. We've never had such a problem in Deepholm before the destruction of the World Pillar.$B$BYour Earthen Ring must repair the damage before it's too late.
